cgcloud__Product_Category_Share__c.name: cgcloud__Product_Category_Share__c
cgcloud__Product_Category_Share__c.description: This business class contains the product categories or brands that a user manages.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Account__c.description: Reference to the account for which the promotion access rights are defined.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Defines whether the current record is to be used for promotion access rights.

cgcloud__Group__c.description: User group for which the product group rights is to be defined.

cgcloud__Product__c.description: Reference to either the product at product level category or the brand for which rights are granted.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the details page of the Product Catergory Share related list record.

cgcloud__User_Group__c.description: User group for which the product group rights is to be defined.

cgcloud__User__c.description: Reference to the user for which the product group rights is to be defined.
